name: Windows Application Driver
description: Use this extention to integrate Windows Application Driver (WinAppDriver) into your Azure Pipeline.
helpMarkDown: Checkout the WinAppDriver GitHub Repo to learn more - https://github.com/Microsoft/WinAppDriver
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: OperationType
inputs.label: Start or Stop WinAppDriver on Agent

inputs.name: WADArguments
inputs.label: Pass in command line arguments here
inputs.helpMarkDown: Runs WinAppDriver.exe as administrator with command line arguments specifying local IP and port (e.g. pass in 127.0.0.1:4723 for both IP address and Port, or just 4723 for just port). May require disabling Windows UAC on Private Agents.

inputs.name: AgentResolution
inputs.label: Select System Resolution on Agent
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select resolution to run on agent. 1080P recommended.
